item.title: CF 1151F (2100)
item.description: 久違的寫 > 2000 的題目，怎麼覺得從 2000 跳到 2100 就變好難 QQ ( 可能是我昨天頭很暈 ) #include <iostream> #include <vector> #include <set> #include <map> #include <queue> #include <deque> #include <algorithm> #include <cstring> #include <cmath> #include <iomanip> #include <unordered_map> #include <bitset> #define pb push_back #define pii pair<int, int> #define f first #define s second #define lowbit(x) (x & -x) #define endl '\n' #define i1 (i << 1) #define i2 (i << 1 | 1) #define iofaster ios::sync_with_stdio(0);cin.
